summary: Ten prisoners condemned to exile on a hostile planet XT-59 must pave the way through swamp to reach the Islands of Happiness, the only safe area on the planet, before the harsh climate or the underground horrors kill them all.
cast: Evgeniy Mironov|Anna Chipovskaya|Vinnie Jones|Nikita Panfilov|Kirill Kozakov|Ivan Verkhovykh|Vladas Bagdonas|Irene Muscara|Linda Nigmatullina|Aleksey Kolubkov|Pyotr Skovtsov|Anna Popova|Walter Grímsson|Davíð Freyr Þórunnarson|Sergey Chikhachyov|Paul Everson|Alexander Frank|Alexandra Frank|Úlfar Jakobsen
title: Vychislitel
